name: ClockWerx
overview: ClockWerx (alternatively known as Clockworks) is a puzzle game based on ClockWerx. The gameplay mechanics remain the same: the player character is controlled like spinner and moves from point to point across a field filled with obstacles. The main goal is to try to find the only one way out of the grid without hitting any obstacles, enemy spinners or other hazards on the field of play. However, the puzzles and graphics were redesigned and there are cutscenes with a new player character.
